p: Method 1: Him (177 mg, 2.59 mmol) and 1 (100 mg, 0.102 mmol) were dissolved in 10 mL CH 2Cl 2, followed by addition of a 10 mL layer of Et 2O. The solution was left for several days, resulting in the formation of yellow crystals, which were filtered and washed with Et 2O. Yield: 102 mg (89.1%). Anal. Calcd for C 58H 48N 9P 2Re: C, 62.24; H, 4.32; N, 11.26%. Found: C, 62.38; H, 4.27; N, 11.36%. 1H NMR in CD 3CN/ppm: 6.94 (s, 4H, Him), 7.60 (s, 2H, Him), 7.64–7.95 (40H, PPh 4 +), 10.31 (br, 2H, Him) UV–vis/nm in the solid state: 405. IR (KBr pellet)/cm –1: 2103 (ν C≡N), 2089 (ν C≡N), 2124 (ν C≡N).
